question: You recently Stayed at your friends Place to look after the house while he/she is away. You accidentally damaged something in his/her house.write a letter to feed friend In your letter You Should :•	Describe what the accident was•	explain when it happened•	Suggest how the damage can be fixed
text: I hope you are doing well. The main endeavour of writing this letter is to express my regrets about a small accident that occurred in your house. It was really a good time that you gave me the opportunity to stay at your home and to know more about the city as I am not aware of this area.

However, last Sunday, the TV remote broke down. When I was watching a cricket match. Actually, it was an extremely  tense match and I lost my Control by seeing that my favourite team was going to be won the match and Suddenly the remote fell down. Then I tried to repair it but the keys were not working.

The following day, I Visited e nearby electronic shop. The shop owner promised me that it could be repaired in a couple of days and the will deliver to your home address. To know this I got relief and Come back home,and it will be working properly and you can enjoy your movie series. Once again I really apologised for that.
